participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves storytelling and expressing herself through singing.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and practical, enjoys hands-on activities and appreciates the arts.
participant_2.background: my sister is a pole dancer. i can drive a tractor. my favorite color is red. i enjoy listening to classical music.
